title: Is globalization the last step of civilization? - Quora

response.answer_text: So called liberal many times calls globalization as the last step of civilization.But,end of civilization should culminate into more equal and democratic world.Instead of creating equality globalization has increased intrastate and interstate disparity ,concentration of wealth in few hands.Globalization is soft underbelly of imperialism and it has led to emergence of global uncivil society in the form of terrorism and organized crime. Globalization can not move further without democratization!!

GZlobalization is only answerand remedy for all the problems we are facing now. All the human soceities should come under one global rule. The modern education system should teach tolerance.Well being should be the Only motto.Geographical borders political supemacies religious restrictions should not come in the way.All the nuclear bombs and weapons need to be destroyed otherwise it will destroy the entire world.UNO should take immediate step.
